snippet: The gala, to be held on May 10, will have a French theme, the company announced on Wednesday, and will feature the world-premieres of two ballets.
abstract: The gala, to be held on May 10, will have a French theme, the company announced on Wednesday, and will feature the world-premieres of two ballets.

headline.main: A Salute to France and World Premieres for New York City Ballet Gala
headline.print_headline: A French Accent For City Ballet Gala
